title: Short-Intensive Special Education Introduction Course Based on Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: No foundational special education concepts, holds general education experience
context.additional_context: Specialized training for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields to acquire effective special education approaches in mobile learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners define 20 core special education terms with 90% accuracy through flipped learning content.
Learners explain five inclusive educational strategies for supporting students with disabilities by applying them to real-world cases.
Learners create and execute a self-directed learning plan using a mobile platform.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
